#summary A powerful event broker extension which allows to map source events to destination events.
= Features =
  * Remap your existing events a few lines of code!
  * Transparently integrates into your existing usage of the event broker
  * Adapters for major .NET mapping technologies
    * AutoMapper
    * more to come
  * Convention based mapping

= Documentation =

For basic usage please see EventBroker and EventBrokerTutorial
